metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12178 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Buffer overflow in network stack for EDK II may allow unprivileged user to potentially enable escalation of privilege and/or denial of service via network.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12178` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ovmf - 0~20160408.ffea0a2c-2ubuntu0.1
qemu-efi - 0~20160408.ffea0a2c-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: edk2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0~20160408.ffea0a2c-2ubuntu0.1').
